meanings.sent1: At night, she often sleepwalks around the house without waking up.
meanings.sent2: He sometimes sleepwalks into his sister's room during the night.
meanings.sent3: The sleepwalking cat wandered aimlessly around the room, bumping into furniture.
meanings.sent4: In his dream, he sleepwalks through a magical forest filled with glowing trees.
meanings.sent5: The ghostly figure of a woman sleepwalks through the old mansion every midnight.

meanings.sent1: During his deep sleep, he often sleepwalks and rearranges his bookshelf.
meanings.sent2: She once sleepwalked into the kitchen and made herself a sandwich without waking up.
meanings.sent3: The sleepwalking dog managed to open the fridge and eat all the cheese.
meanings.sent4: In her dream, she sleepwalks through a bustling marketplace, buying exotic fruits.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious man sleepwalks every night, painting intricate patterns on the walls.
